document_data.name: Nevik'Dethig
document_data.mainbody: '''Nevik'Dethig''' was an [[aboleth]] in the [[Lake of Blood]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|19-20}}
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], having heard the whispers of the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]], Nevik'Dethig settled inside the Lake of Blood, quickly gaining some [[orc]] minions from [[Maerimydra]].

When the allied factions attacked Maerimydra, the aboleth was confronted by an adventuring party supported by a [[mind flayer]], [[Vilcuum]].
document_data.Personality: Nevik'Dethig was curious about the war at Maerimydra. He believed that no [[humanoid]] could harm him.
